name: Zephee
0:
”Alexa, open smart premises”
”Alexa, start smart premises”
”Alexa, launch smart premises”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart premises
Developer Terms of Use
des:
zephee provides first of its kind end to end Internet Of Things(IOT) solutions
working with a wide range of sensors and transmitters to enable applications for security,
monitoring, efficiency and automation. The app may be used with a wide range of iBall
proprietary, state of the art, communication sensors called SATs (Sensor Analytic
Technology) connected to IngOT cloud using iBall’s patented RF technology iCue©, which
transforms a passive premise to a live and actively monitored system on finger tips. The
solutions can help with monitoring, home security, process automation, control systems and
many other applications. The app helps with easy adoption of the miraculous IOT
technology to help feeling connected with your valued ones more than ever before.
